name: Luca's Tale
description:
This is my first game and was created for submission to the #BWJam. It's just a few short levels and more of a prototype.  Feel free to leave feedback!

Controls: 

'wasd' to move

'left mouse' to fire

'Space' to jump

GamePlay:

Use JumpPads to reach new heights!

Jump on spider webs, but be careful, they disappear!

Hide behind bushes from scary ghosts!

Find your owner in 3 short levels!

**Some art was created with MRMOTEXT asset pack(https://mrmotarius.itch.io/mrmotext) 

**Created with Unity
